howToUse.title: How to Use the MiniMax AI Video Generator

steps.title: Upload Your Image
steps.content: Start by uploading the image you want to convert into a video. Whether it‚Äôs a drawing, photo, or digital art, MiniMax AI Video Generator can bring it to life.

steps.title: Enter a Detailed Prompt
steps.content: Provide a clear description of the animation you envision. Include details about motion, expressions, and any specific effects or styles you want the AI to apply.

steps.title: Generate Your Video
steps.content: Hit the 'Generate Animation' button and watch as the AI transforms your static image into a vivid, animated video in just moments.

steps.title: Download and Share Your Creation
steps.content: Once generated, download your video in high quality and share it across your social media, projects, or portfolio.

faq.title: MiniMax AI Video Generator FAQ
faq.description: Answers to the most frequently asked questions about using the MiniMax AI Video Generator.
faq.q1: What is the MiniMax AI Video Generator?
faq.a1: It is a smart AI tool that converts static images such as photos or drawings into animated video content using cutting-edge artificial intelligence algorithms.
faq.q2: How does the MiniMax AI Video Generator work?
faq.a2: The AI interprets the uploaded image and the animation prompt to generate video frames that simulate motion and animation effects, creating a seamless video from static visuals.
faq.q3: What types of images can be animated with MiniMax AI Video Generator?
faq.a3: You can animate various types of images including digital art, illustrations, photos, and graphics‚Äîmaking them dynamic videos suitable for different media.
faq.q4: Do I need any animation experience to use this tool?
faq.a4: No animation or technical skills are needed. The AI handles the entire process, making it accessible for everyone from beginners to professionals.
faq.q5: Can I use the generated videos for commercial purposes?
faq.a5: Yes, videos produced with MiniMax AI Video Generator can be used in both personal and commercial projects, following the tool‚Äôs terms of use.
faq.q6: Are there limitations on the number of videos I can create?
faq.a6: The video creation limits depend on your subscription plan, with free tiers offering limited generations and premium plans providing extended or unlimited usage.
faq.q7: What formats does the MiniMax AI Video Generator support?
faq.a7: Common image formats such as JPG and PNG are supported, with the output typically delivered in popular video formats ready for sharing or editing.
faq.q8: Can I customize the animation style or effects?
faq.a8: Yes, by providing detailed prompts on motion, style, and effects, you can guide the AI to produce animations tailored to your vision.
